body_html:
The relevant portion is this:
gradients = tf.gradients(discriminator(x_dash, reuse=True)[0], [x_dash])[0]

The discriminator here is a simple LSTM implemented using tf.nn.dynamic_rnn.

The error I get is: TypeError: Second-order gradient for while loops not supported.

I am trying to implement the gradient penalty term from this paper: https://arxiv.org/abs/1704.00028 (Improved training of WassGANs)
body_text:
The relevant portion is this:
gradients = tf.gradients(discriminator(x_dash, reuse=True)[0], [x_dash])[0]
The discriminator here is a simple LSTM implemented using tf.nn.dynamic_rnn.
The error I get is: TypeError: Second-order gradient for while loops not supported.
I am trying to implement the gradient penalty term from this paper: https://arxiv.org/abs/1704.00028 (Improved training of WassGANs)
body:
The relevant portion is this:
`gradients = tf.gradients(discriminator(x_dash, reuse=True)[0], [x_dash])[0]`

The `discriminator` here is a simple LSTM implemented using `tf.nn.dynamic_rnn`.

The error I get is: `TypeError: Second-order gradient for while loops not supported.`

I am trying to implement the gradient penalty term from this paper: https://arxiv.org/abs/1704.00028 (Improved training of WassGANs)
